scripts.cleardoc: start "" "C:\Program Files\Git\git-bash.exe" -c "docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=server -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=server -a -q) && docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=client -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=client -a -q) && docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=postgres -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=postgres -a -q) && docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=mongo:latest -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=mongo:latest -a -q)"
scripts.start: start cmd /k "docker run -p 5432:5432 -d  -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=Nour2001  -e POSTGRES_USER=nTeam  -e POSTGRES_DB=BarbarFinder  -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data  postgres && exit" && start cmd /k "docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name mongodb -v mongodb_volume:/data/db mongo:latest && exit" && start cmd /k "docker build -t client ./client && docker run -d -p 8080:80 client && exit"&& start cmd /k "docker build -t server ./server && docker run -d -p 4545:4545 server && exit"
scripts.clearsdev: start "" "C:\Program Files\Git\git-bash.exe" -c "docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=server -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=server -a -q) && docker stop $(docker ps --filter ancestor=client -q) && docker rm $(docker ps --filter ancestor=client -a -q) "
scripts.serverdev: start cmd /k "docker build -t client ./client && docker run -d -p 8080:80 client && exit"&& start cmd /k "docker build -t server ./server && docker run -d -p 4545:4545 server && exit"
